0010001000100111 0011001101000110 1 -> sum: 0101010101101110, cout: 0
1101000111111100 1111010111001111 1 -> sum: 1100011111001100, cout: 1

1001110101010101 1110000111000010 0 -> sum: 0111111100010111, cout: 1
0011000111011100 1110001110101101 1 -> sum: 0001010110001010, cout: 1
0000000000000000 0000000000000000 0 -> sum: 0000000000000000, cout: 0

0111111111111111 1000000000000001 1 -> sum: 0000000000000001, cout: 1
